page.title: 15A day in my life(Civilian).1
page.content: On 18 June when I'd just got up my mum called me to feed my calf Flash so I dressed, got his food ready, fed him, & put him in the field. Then I ran down the yard to see 53.She is ready to farrow today & I am very excited.When I got to the farrowing house I sat down by & rubbed her belly.I thought to my- self I will see if she has any milk. I touched her teat & all the milk came out & it hit me on the face.I walked up the yard & went inside.During breakfast I was thinking to myself,"How many will she have?I think she'll have 12".It was now 8.35 so I got ready for school jump -ed over the gate & crossed the road. I met Stephen & we put our bags in the classroom then went to the rabbit hutch as the bell went.In class we did our write-up on ou5r trip to the Forest of Dean until the bell went for dinnertime so I went home. (CONTINUED PAGE 16).
